text: The men's 100 metre breaststroke competition of the swimming event at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games was held on 7 June at the OCBC Aquatic Centre in Kallang, Singapore. ==Records== Prior to this competition, the existing Asian and Games records were as follows: {| class="wikitable" |- |Asian record | |58.90 |Tokyo, Japan |3 April 2012 |- |Games record | |1:01.60 |Vientiane, Laos |11 December 2009 |} ==Schedule== All times are Singapore Standard Time (UTC+08:00) {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Event |- |rowspan="3"|Sunday, 7 June 2015 ||09:05 ||Heat 1 |- |09:06 ||Heat 2 |-style="background- color:lemonchiffon;" |19:44 ||Final |} ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0.5em auto; font-size:90%; title: Swimming at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games – Men's 100 metre breaststroke
